bodyEn: The dolls are each with their own personality. They suit best as decoration items and are made either standing or sitting. The felt dolls measure about 5-6cm and they are made from sheep wool and chenille stem. The ballerina dolls are 13-14 cm.
bodyEt: Vildist nukud on valmistatud n천elviltimistehnikas lambavillast ja karvatraadist. Nukud sobivad kodu kaunistamiseks, nad on seisavad, istuvad ja riputatavad. Vildist nukkude m천천tmed on 5-6 cm. Baleriin nukud on 13-14 cm.
